document.full_text: unlike pools that award the same number of points no matter what teams you pick, bonus-point pools are eminently beatable because most people don't know how to play them correctly.
document.title: 2011 n.c.a.a. tournament | selection sunday: keeping score: how to win a pool that rewards upsets
lines_and_colors: unlike pools that award the same number of points no matter what teams you pick, bonus-point pools are eminently beatable because most people don't know how to play them correctly.
